Articles.Content:
Hello guys,

I'm Nick and i started to play Kerbal some weeks ago from the version v0.22 and i really enjoyed it!

Now I finnally found the official forum and I think it will be the best place to learn and share info about this wonderful game!

See you... around Kerbin!
Hi Nick_7. Welcome to the game, and to the forum.
Welcome! Have you been having any trouble with things so far?.
Welcome fellow kerbonaut! We're glad to have you onboard!
